section.heading: Manufacturer tax not applicable to cleaning fish

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.04 > Section 82.04.2403 82.04.240 << 82.04.2403 >> 82.04.2404 PDF RCW 82.04.2403 Manufacturer tax not applicable to cleaning fish. The tax imposed by RCW 82.04.240 does not apply to cleaning fish. "Cleaning fish" means the removal of the head, fins, or viscera from fresh fish without further processing, other than freezing. [ 1994 c 167 s 1 .] NOTES: Effective date — 1994 c 167: "This act is necessary for the immediate preservation of the public peace, health, or safety, or support of the state government and its existing public institutions, and shall take effect immediately [March 30, 1994]." [ 1994 c 167 s 3 .]
